issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Fast stripe level merging for ORC

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Precondition checks should not fail the merge task in case of automatic trigger

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently tez falls back to MR task for merge file task. It will beneficial to convert the merge file tasks to tez task to make use of the performance gains from tez.
fields.summary: Create tez task for fast file merging

ATTACHMENT ID: 12668413
The test failures are caused by HIVE-7812. It should be fixed by HIVE-8088. Committed this patch to trunk. Thanks [~hagleitn] and [~vikram.dixit] for the reviews.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
